articles.author: Firdia Lisnawati
articles.title: US Woman in Bali 'Suitcase Murder' Freed From Jail - NBC Chicago
articles.description: DENPASAR, Indonesia (AP) — An American woman convicted of helping to kill her mother on Indonesia’s tourist island of Bali in 2014 walked free from prison Friday after serving seven years of a 10-year sentence and will be deported to the United States.

articles.title: Biden set for audience with Pope Francis in a meeting heavy with symbolism for America's second Catholic president - CNN
articles.description: The last time President Joe Biden visited the Vatican, he was still reeling from the loss of his son Beau to cancer a year earlier.
